thread.title_full: Arabian Courtyard Hotel and Spa announces opening of Pharaoh Café & RestaurantTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Arabian Courtyard Hotel and Spa announces opening of Pharaoh Café & RestaurantTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Arabian Courtyard Hotel and Spa announces opening of Pharaoh Café & Restaurant Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
Arabian Courtyard Hotel & Spa, located in the heart of the ancient cultural district and diplomatic enclosure of Dubai has announced the opening of Pharaoh Café & Restaurant.
True to its slogan, “Feel the Touch of Ancient Egyptian Legacy”, Pharaoh Café & Restaurant is the evolution of Egyptian and Mediterranean cuisines catering to all types of palates including vegetarian, non-veg and vegan. Koshary, one of the most popular dishes is a complete vegetarian and full of nutrition. Another specialty of the Pharaoh Café is delicious camel burger for those who wish to explore an exotic dining experience. There are several other signature dishes that bring a new level of excitement due its unique setting and presentation style to the dinners.
Set as a mini Egyptian Museum right across the Dubai Museum, the restaurant welcome travelers and local residents to have a unique experience of heritage and enjoy authentic Egyptian and Mediterranean cuisines prepared by specialty chefs. The restaurant also serves exciting cocktail and wines to compliment the taste and a refreshing after-meal cup of “Karkadeh” (Hibiscus tea).
Habib Khan, CEO of Planet Hospitality, said: “We are very proud to announce the opening of Pharaoh Café and Restaurant. The restaurant is built to adopt the best practices of ancient Egyptian culinary and preserve the healthy eating habits and added many regional and contemporary dishes to compliment and excite anyone’s palate. We invite everyone to come and have a unique dining experience.”
Located in downtown Bur Dubai, the Arabian Courtyard represents the true warm hospitality of the Arabian culture. Free valet parking will be offered to all guests.
